Contents:
If I'm running an eval and I want to use a custom task, would i put the path to its .yaml file after the `--tasks` flag? So, it would look like:

`lm_eval --model hf \`
`   --model_args pretrained=EleutherAI/gpt-j-6B \`
`    --tasks "path/to/my/file.yaml" \`
`    --device cuda:0 \`
`    --batch_size 8`
